summary: The contact owns a 2013 CMC Sierra contact stated that when driving at 70mph hauling a 2021 6X12 Arising Trailer. the trailer jack failed, the wheel bearing became loose, the trailer fender separated, the fender screws separated and caused the fender to hang., the trim boards separated. The contact repaired the trailer. the contact was able to tighten the wheel bearing, the contact reattached the fender, the inside board trims and screwed the boards back together. The trailer was repaired. The manufacturer was contacted.
